long_description: Sunny skies are always welcome, but don't get caught without shades. The Bolle Morph polarized sunglasses have you covered with high-performance, polarized protection and comfortable frames. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain; glasses provide 100% UV protection. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight, durable nylon frames are built to withstand everyday use. Closeout.
short_description: Sunny skies are always welcome, but don't get caught without shades. The Bolle Morph polarized sunglasses have you covered with high-performance, polarized protection and comfortable frames.
